about.title: About Me
about.subtitle: Connecting technology to business vision
about.description: My work in Support and Implementation at Minerion has given me a privileged view of business processes. I don't just write code or analyze data; I understand the operational context behind every request. This perspective enables me to build tools that are more precise, intuitive, and aligned with the user's ultimate needs.
about.differential_text: The support front line taught me what theory cannot: empathy for the user. I know how to identify bottlenecks, anticipate usability issues, and translate complex requirements into functional deliverables.

differentials.client_vision_text: User-centric development. I understand the client's actual pain points to deliver solutions that generate immediate value and streamline daily tasks.
differentials.analyst_thinking_text: Ability to break down complex problems into logical steps, transforming abstract challenges into practical technical solutions.
differentials.business_process_text: Mastery of the business process lifecycle, from inception to compliance delivery, ensuring systems meet all business requirements.
differentials.communication_text: Ability to bridge the gap between technical and non-technical audiences, translating tech concepts into clear, cohesive language.
